question_text: Which of the following symptoms may indicate a severe LCD hardware failure? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Permanent black bars across the screen
Screen brightness dims slightly after idle
Garbage pixels or colored blocks on startup
Unresponsive screen areas after pressure damage
correct_answer: Permanent black bars across the screen
Garbage pixels or colored blocks on startup
Unresponsive screen areas after pressure damage
explanation: Severe LCD damage results in persistent display artifacts like black bars, colored blocks, or unresponsive regions â€” all of which usually require panel replacement.
